english.segment2: . My days are getting better. Since I read your letter. Every day. Things are so much clearer. Since I let you You nearer. Every Day
english.segment3: I just can't wait to breathe this air. Inside me, Inside me. I just can't wait to see You there. Beside me, Beside me
english.segment4: I got a super good feeling about today. I got a clue that it's You. And You're never gonna go away
english.segment5: My world is spinning towards You. I fall down before you. Every Day. I close my eyes together. Jesus, You forever. Every Day. I just can't wait to see You there. Beside me, Beside me.
